nodes.text: Fighter Gold was a squadron of E-wing escort starfighters assigned to the Endurance-class fleet carrier Intrepid of the New Republic Defense Fleet Fifth Battle Group.

Immediately prior to the Battle of Doornik-319, Fighter Gold was one of the squadrons prepared for immediate launch aboard the Intrepid, and when the Intrepid entered the system, Fighter Gold was part of the fleet carrier's fighter screen, and presumably participated in the ensuing battle during the Yevethan ambush.
